long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Eloo is an AI ALM tool that turns business requirements into engineering specs, to avoid costly mistakes, code rewrites, and product delays.

Eloo is integrated in both document space (Google doc, Confluence) and task management space (Jira) to allow better understanding of product spec, from PRD documents to the development issues.
